    • initDepositWithdrawPane

      private void initDepositWithdrawPane()
      Prepares the deposit and withdraw pane. Adds the clip to see only one window at once, and adds the animation to switch between deposit and withdraw panes

    • checkValidNumber

      private void checkValidNumber(javafx.scene.control.TextField tf, String oldVal, String newVal)
      Checkes if the text of a given text field has a correct number with 0-2 decimals format.
      Parameters:
      tf - the text field
      oldVal - the text of the text field before the last change
      newVal - the text of the text field after the last change
